name: Home Alone (itch) (Emulz, MertBalkan)
description:
The 13 year old girl, a gray hat hacker, As a result of his investigations, uncovers the secret plans of an organization. While sitting alone at home, she hears noises from outside and sees that someone is trying to enter the house. She has to get rid of them in limited time by attacking them with the collected materials at home.

As you successfully defeat the waves of enemies, keys will appear in various locations to open new rooms with other resources.

This game was produced by 5 people in 4 weeks for the bootcamp within the scope of Google Game and Application Academy. Github

Movement

WASD

Loot Item Drop Item/Set trap E  G Attack Hold L  Mouse Button Reset Level T Inventory Slots 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 SlingAttack with left button, hold if you want it to go longer distance Nail Ammo BoxAmmo for use with slingshot that deals 20 damage and allows you to earn 20 points per nail for score Dart Ammo BoxAmmo for use with slingshot that deals 10 damage and allows you to earn 5 points per dart for score LegosA trap that slows enemies and deals 10 damage and allows you to earn y points for score Slime ballA trap that slows enemies and deals 25 damage and allows you to earn 15 points for score DetergentA trap that slows enemies and deals 30 damage and allows you to earn 40 points for score Nerf AmmoAmmo for use with Nerf Gun that deals 3 damage and allows you to earn 5 points per nerf  for score Nerf GunAutomatic dps gun located in living room uses nerf ammo
